content.full_text: Check of Abraham Lincoln to Jacob Bunn, 28 September 18571 Springfield Marine & Fire Insurance Company, Richards & Smith, Printers. Pay toJ. Bunn,or Bearer,Sixteen dollars,68/100Dollars, IN CURRENT BANK NOTES.
paragraphs: Check of Abraham Lincoln to Jacob Bunn, 28 September 18571 Springfield Marine & Fire Insurance Company, Richards & Smith, Printers. Pay toJ. Bunn,or Bearer,Sixteen dollars,68/100Dollars, IN CURRENT BANK NOTES.

footnotes.text: 1Abraham Lincoln filled in the blanks of this partially printed check and signed it.
2It is unknown for what Lincoln made this payment to Jacob Bunn.

structured_content.text: Check of Abraham Lincoln to Jacob Bunn, 28 September 18571
